\subsection*{Part (d)}

\begin{lstlisting}
tol = 1e-6;
for i=1:10
	str = sprintf('Init. val: %d', i);
	disp(str)
	disp(newton(@func, @dfunc, i, tol));
end
\end{lstlisting}
\begin{lstlisting}[language={},xleftmargin=5pt,frame=none]

 1.2866
Init. val: 2
No convergence
